ResourceHeader.ResourceName: AeroCube-6A Dosimeter Data, 1 s and 0.1 s Data

RevisionEvent.Note: Numerical metadata added to the Github.
Minor changes, added Funding agency. JMW

ResourceHeader.Description: Each AeroCube-6 vehicle carries three dosimeters measuring electrons with energies from about 43 keV to about 830 keV and protons with energies ranging from 370 keV to 12 MeV. The dataset manager, Dr. Paul O Brien, can be reached at paul.obrien@aero.org. The data are described in AeroCube-6 Dosimeter Data README (v3.0), Aerospace Report No. TOR-2016-01155, The Aerospace Corporation, March 4, 2016, El Segundo, CA. Also see AeroCube-6 Dosimeter Equivalent Energy Thresholds and Flux Conversion Factors, Aerospace Report No. TOR-2017-02598, The Aerospace Corporation, July 1, 2019, El Segundo, CA.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: The AC6 Principal Investigator is Dr. T.P. O Brien. Aerospace and government personnel who contributed to the AeroCube-6 mission: J. Bern Blake, D. Hinkley, C. Venturini, J. Avrett, D. Mabry, W. Crain, C. Nguyen, B. Hardy, J. Lee, D. Turner, D. Rowen, C. Coffman, B. Barney, P. Doyle, J. Fuller, D. Pedrino, G. Maul, D. Rumsey, A. Chin, R. Stevens, A Schutte, D. Arndt, and E. Mazur. Those wishing to use AC6 data are strongly urged to notify the PI of the topic of their work. This will enable the AC6 team to assist in use of the data and to track the instruments utility to the broader community.

InformationURL.Name: AC6 Data at RBSP Science Gateway
InformationURL.Description: AC6 Data at RBSP Science Gateway

AccessURL.Name: HTTPS from SPDF
AccessURL.Description: Access to Data in CDF Format via https from SPDF

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb
AccessURL.Description: Access to ASCII, CDF, and Plots via NASA/GSFC CDAWeb

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator T.P. O Brien. Please acknowledge the Data Providers and CDAWeb when using these Data.

Parameter.Name: Epoch
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Midpoint UTC of 1-second (survey) data.

Parameter.Name: alt
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Geodetic altitude.

Parameter.Name: lat
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Geodetic latitude.

Parameter.Name: lon
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Geodetic longitude

Parameter.Name: XYZ_GEO
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft Position (GEO).

Parameter.Name: dos1l
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Dose1 low output.

Parameter.Name: dos1m
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Dose1 medium output.

Parameter.Name: dos1rate
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Dose1 rate (>43 keV electrons, >370 keV protons AC6-A and B).

Parameter.Name: dos2l
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Dose2 low output.

Parameter.Name: dos2m
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Dose2 medium output.

Parameter.Name: dos2rate
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Dose2 rate (>530 keV protons AC6-A and B).

Parameter.Name: dos3l
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Dose3 low output.

Parameter.Name: dos3m
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Dose3 medium output.

Parameter.Name: dos3rate
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Dose3 rate (>860 keV electrons, 12 MeV protons AC6-A; >11 MeV protons AC6-B).

Parameter.Name: flag
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: bitmap: 0 - data OK, 1 - ground contact transmitter noise, 2- crosslink transmitter noise, 4 - dubious attitude, 8 - TLE ephemeris, 16 - dos3-A noisy day.

Parameter.Name: Sample_Rate
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Sample rate, 1 or 10 Hz.

Parameter.Name: Lm_IGRF
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: McIlwain L for locally mirroring particle, IGRF magnetic field.

Parameter.Name: Bmag_IGRF
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Magnitude of IGRF magnetic field at vehicle.

Parameter.Name: MLT_IGRF
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Solar local time at equatorial crossing of IGRF magnetic field line through vehicle.

Parameter.Name: InvLat_IGRF
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Invariant latitude (McIlwain L) for locally mirroring particle, IGRF magnetic field.

Parameter.Name: Lm_OPQ
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: McIlwain L for locally mirroring particle, OPQ magnetic field.

Parameter.Name: Bmag_OPQ
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Magnitude of OPQ magnetic field at vehicle.

Parameter.Name: MLT_OPQ
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Solar local time at equatorial crossing of OPQ magnetic field line through vehicle.

Parameter.Name: InvLat_OPQ
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Invariant latitude (McIlwain L) for locally mirroring particle, OPQ magnetic field.

Parameter.Name: Loss_Cone_Type
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: 0 - trapped, 1 - drift loss cone, 2 - bounce loss cone, -1 = open/unknown, for locally mirroring particles, OPQ magnetic field.

Parameter.Name: Bxyz_GEO
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: OPQ model magnetic field vector in GEO.

Parameter.Name: Beq
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Minimum magnetic field strength on field line through vehicle, OPQ magnetic field.

Parameter.Name: I
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Integral invariant for locally mirroring particle, OPQ magnetic field.

Parameter.Name: K
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Kaufmann invariant for locally mirroring particle, OPQ magnetic field.

Parameter.Name: K_Z
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Kaufmann invariant for normally incident particle, OPQ magnetic field.

Parameter.Name: Lstar
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Modified third invariant (L*) for locally mirroring particle, OPQ magnetic field.

Parameter.Name: Lstar_Z
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Modified third invariant (L*) for normally incident particle, OPQ magnetic field.

Parameter.Name: Hmin
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Minimum mirror altitude around drift shell for locally mirroring particle, OPQ magnetic field.

Parameter.Name: Hmin_Z
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Minimum mirror altitude around drift shell for normally incident particle, OPQ magnetic field.

Parameter.Name: Loss_Cone_Near
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Polar angle of near hemisphere loss cone (100 km), OPQ magnetic field.

Parameter.Name: Loss_Cone_Far
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Polar angle of opposite hemisphere loss cone (100 km), OPQ magnetic field.

Parameter.Name: B100N
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: OPQ magnetic field strength at 100 km altitude, northern hemisphere on field line through vehicle.

Parameter.Name: LAT100N
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Geodetic latitude at 100 km altitude, northern hemisphere, on OPQ magnetic field line through vehicle.

Parameter.Name: LON100N
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Geodetic longitude at 100 km altitude, northern hemisphere, on OPQ magnetic field line through vehicle.

Parameter.Name: B100S
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: OPQ magnetic field strength at 100 km altitude, southern hemisphere on field line through vehicle.

Parameter.Name: LAT100S
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Geodetic latitude at 100 km altitude, southern hemisphere, on OPQ magnetic field line through vehicle.

Parameter.Name: LON100S
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Geodetic longitude at 100 km altitude, southern hemisphere, on OPQ magnetic field line through vehicle.

Parameter.Name: Alpha
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Local pitch angle of normally incident particle, OPQ magnetic field.

Parameter.Name: Alpha_X
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Local pitch angle of particle moving along spacecraft X axis, OPQ magnetic field.

Parameter.Name: Alpha_Y
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Local pitch angle of particle moving along spacecraft Y axis, OPQ magnetic field.

Parameter.Name: Alpha_Eq
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Equatorial pitch angle of normally incident particle, OPQ magnetic field.

Parameter.Name: Beta
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Gyrophase angle of normally incident particle, OPQ magnetic field.

Parameter.Name: Beta_X
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Gyrophase angle of particle moving along spacecraft X axis, OPQ magnetic field.

Parameter.Name: Beta_Y
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Gyrophase angle of particle moving along spacecraft Y axis, OPQ magnetic field.

Parameter.Name: Phi_B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Longitude of OPQ magnetic field in sensor coordinates.

Parameter.Name: OmegaXYZ_GEO
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Spin axis vector in GEO.

Parameter.Name: B_spin
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Angle between OPQ magnetic field and spin axis.

Parameter.Name: Spin_Sun
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Angle between spin axis and sun

Parameter.Name: Dist_In_Track
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: In track distance, AC6A - AC6B. Spatial separation between the two AeroCube spacecraft.

Parameter.Name: Lag_In_Track
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: In track time separation, AC6A - AC6B. Temporal separation between the two AeroCube spacecraft.

Parameter.Name: Dist_Cross_Track_Horiz
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Horizontal cross-track distance, AC6A - AC6B, Positive is East. Spatial separation between the two AeroCube spacecraft.

Parameter.Name: Dist_Cross_Track_Vert
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Vertical cross-track distance, AC6A - AC6B. Spatial separation between the two AeroCube spacecraft.

Parameter.Name: Dist_Total
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Total separation distance, AC6A - AC6B. Spatial separation between the two AeroCube spacecraft.

Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch_10Hz

Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch_10Hz
Parameter.Description: Dose3 medium output.

Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch_10Hz

Parameter.Description: Kaufmann invariant for normally incident particle, OPQ magnetic field.

Parameter.Description: Modified third invariant (L*) for normally incident particle, OPQ magnetic field.

Parameter.Description: Minimum mirror altitude around drift shell for normally incident particle, OPQ magnetic field.

Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch_10Hz
Parameter.Description: Gyrophase angle of normally incident particle, OPQ magnetic field.

Parameter.Name: Dist_In_Track_10Hz
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch_10Hz
Parameter.Description: In track distance, AC6A - AC6B. Spatial separation between the two AeroCube spacecraft.

Parameter.Name: Lag_In_Track_10Hz
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch_10Hz
Parameter.Description: In track time separation, AC6A - AC6B. Spatial separation between the two AeroCube spacecraft.

Parameter.Name: Dist_Cross_Track_Horiz_10Hz
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch_10Hz
Parameter.Description: Horizontal cross-track distance, AC6A - AC6B, Positive is East. Spatial separation between the two AeroCube spacecraft.

Parameter.Name: Dist_Cross_Track_Vert_10Hz
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch_10Hz
Parameter.Description: Vertical cross-track distance, AC6A - AC6B. Spatial separation between the two AeroCube spacecraft.

Parameter.Name: Dist_Total_10Hz
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch_10Hz
Parameter.Description: Total separation distance, AC6A - AC6B. Spatial separation between the two AeroCube spacecraft.
